org.springframework.cloud.stream.binding

Class AbstractBindingTargetFactory<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.cloud.stream.binding.AbstractBindingTargetFactory<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BindingTargetFactory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    MessageSourceBindingTargetFactory, SubscribableChannelBindingTargetFactory

    public abstract class AbstractBindingTargetFactory<T>
extends Object
implements BindingTargetFactory
    A BindingTargetFactory implementation that restricts the type of binding target to a specified class and its supertypes.
    Author:
    Marius Bogoevici
